name: UIAlertAction
desc: An action that can be taken when the user taps a button in an alert.

items.name: init(title: String?, style: UIAlertAction.Style, handler: ((UIAlertAction) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Create and return an action with the specified title and behavior.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The title of the action’s button.

items.name: var style: UIAlertAction.Style
items.desc: The style that is applied to the action’s button.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the action is currently enabled.

items.name: enum UIAlertAction.Style
items.desc: Styles to apply to action buttons in an alert.
